input.sentences: the villagers waited patiently for the new medication .
dr. [male] sorting and handing out some pills .

[female] gets ready to give out pain relief medication .

output.sentences: I saw them that waited, the villagers and they did so patiently.
The sorting of the pills that were needed was done by Franco, and a male whose name I didn't catch.
Medication can be hard to get for the males in the village that have malaria.
SOme felt no relief to see us there, and others were more than ready because they were consumed with pain.
A team of this sort rarely sits.
